abstract: Carl C. Icahn, the activist investor, does not want Dell to become a private company by selling to its founder, Michael S. Dell and the private equity firm Silver Lake Partners.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn, the activist investor, does not want Dell to become a private company by selling to its founder, Michael S. Dell and the private equity firm Silver Lake Partners.
lead_paragraph: As a battle builds over the $24.4 billion buyout of the computer maker Dell Inc., an important date is drawing near.

headline.main: Icahn Seeks Special Dividend for Shareholders of Dell Inc.
headline.print_headline: Icahn Seeks Special Dividend for Shareholders of Dell Inc.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
